---
title: "TCGA-SKCM数据"
output: html_document
---
```{r}
query1<- GDCquery(project = "TCGA-SKCM", 
                  data.category = "Transcriptome Profiling",
                  data.type = "Gene Expression Quantification",
                  workflow.type = "HTSeq - Counts")
GDCdownload(query1)
data1<-GDCprepare(query1)
dataPrep1<-TCGAanalyze_Preprocessing(data1,
                                     cor.cut = 0.6,
                                     datatype = "HTSeq - Counts")
dataNorm1<-TCGAanalyze_Normalization(dataPrep1,
                                     geneInfo = geneInfoHT,
                                     method = "gcContent")
dataNorm2<-TCGAanalyze_Normalization(dataNorm1,
                                     geneInfo = geneInfoHT,
                                     method = "geneLength")
dataFilt1<-TCGAanalyze_Filtering(dataNorm2,
                                 method = "quantile",
                                 qnt.cut = 0.25)
dataPrep1_raw<-UseRaw_afterFilter(dataPrep1,dataFilt1)
```
